title: Shish kebabs
ingredients: ['500g minced lamb', '2 tablespoons fresh coriander, finely chopped', '2 onions, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon tumeric', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon vinegar', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'oil cooking spray', 'fried onion and coriander for garnish (optional)']
